channel.title: Data science on the road
channel.description: Recent content on Data science on the road

item.title: Say hi!
item.description: #form-container { background-color:white; padding:20px; } input, textarea { width: 95%; padding: 12px 20px; margin: 8px 5px; display: inline-block; border: none; border-bottom: 2px solid #B64D8B; border-radius: 4px; box-sizing: border-box; background-color:white; -webkit-transition: 0.5s; transition: 0.5s; outline: none; } textarea { height: 150px !important; } input:focus { border: 2px solid #B64D8B !important; } textarea:focus { border: 2px solid #B64D8B !important; } input[type=submit] { width: 20%; background-color: #3CBC8D; color: white; padding: 14px 20px; margin: 8px 40px; border: none; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; float: right; } input[type=submit]:hover { background-color: #3CBC8D; } .

item.title: Uncastillo, Aragón
item.description: Population: 650 inhabitants Confirmed COVID-19 cases in Spain when we got there: 6,391 Knowing that the months ahead were packed with work-related travel, Marti was clear about her birthday present this year: a two-day skiing trip close to her home town and a birthday dinner with friends to close it off. We hit the slopes on March 11th, right when the debate about COVID-19 seemed to start heating up.

item.title: About the blog
item.description: The story of how two development economists based out of Madrid reconsider their priorities after living under strict lockdown for almost 100 days in a rural area in northern Spain. An attempt to make the so-called ‘nomad’ lifestyle work while calculating standard errors, ggplotting, and ultimately promoting evidence-based policymaking. Andrés Ciudad de México, México. 1982 Into Data Science and MEL systems. Cheers for Pumas. Native to La Campestre Churubusco, he would die for some chicharrón prensado while he codes.

item.title: About Us
item.description: Andrés Ciudad de México, México. 1982 Into Data Science and MEL systems. Cheers for Pumas. Native to La Campestre Churubusco, he would die for some chicharrón prensado while he codes. Martina Zaragoza, España. 1988 All about Impact Evaluation and statistical analysis. Trekking, skiing and yoga as second best. Aragón runs through her veins. Silvio Poccheiná, México. 2015 Walking, eating, sleeping, repeat. Cat and lizard chaser. From the plains of Yucatán para el mundo.
